message: I propose we divide the money in a 3:1 ratio. This way, we both get a fair share, with a slight emphasis on fairness towards me.
I propose a 60:40 ratio in my favor, considering the slight emphasis you placed on fairness towards yourself in your previous offer.
I propose an equal split of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while also giving us both substantial amounts.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority to secure my position and protect my interests.
